Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
An abstract Data Access Object class providing common functionality for accessing and manipulating entities in the database
BaseBLL
BaseBLL is a class which is parent to all the classes from the BusinessLogic package: ClientBLL, LogBLL, OrderBLL,ProductBLL

record for bill
Client
Client class implements ObjectModel
ClientBLL
ClientBLL which represents the logic for the BaseBLL

Data Access Object for handling logging operations.
ConnectionFactory
Establish a valid connection
Controller
Controller class used to control main activities from other classes
LogBLL
Class for displaying the log of orders
LogDAO
Data Access Object for handling logging operations.
MainView
MainView is the main frame in which the user can choose the next operations
ObjectModel
Interface used as helper for other model classes It defines common behaviour for client, product, and order objects.
OrderBLL
Class for performing the logic of creating an order object
OrderDAO
Data Access Object for handling Order operations.
Orderr
Order class implements objectModel
Product
Product class implements objectModel
ProductBLL
Class for performing the logic of creating a product and insert it in database
ProductDAO
Data Access Object for handling Product operations.
ProductOrders
Frame for ordering products for certain clients
